SLA.DESCRIPTION: Acordos de nível de serviço (SLAs) são contratos que definem expectativas claras entre sua equipe e os clientes. Eles estabelecem padrões para tempos de resposta e resolução, criando uma estrutura de responsabilização e garantindo uma experiência consistente e de alta qualidade.

LIST.404: Não há SLAs disponíveis nesta conta.
LIST.DESCRIPTION: Service Level Agreements (SLAs) are contracts that define clear expectations between your team and customers. They establish standards for response and resolution times, creating a framework for accountability and ensures a consistent, high-quality experience.

PAYWALL.TITLE: Upgrade to create SLAs
PAYWALL.AVAILABLE_ON: The SLA feature is only available in the Business and Enterprise plans.
PAYWALL.UPGRADE_PROMPT: Upgrade your plan to get access to advanced features like team management, automations, custom attributes, and more.
PAYWALL.CANCEL_ANYTIME: You can change or cancel your plan anytime

ENTERPRISE_PAYWALL.AVAILABLE_ON: The SLA feature is only available in the paid plans.
ENTERPRISE_PAYWALL.UPGRADE_PROMPT: Upgrade to a paid plan to access advanced features like audit logs, agent capacity, and more.
ENTERPRISE_PAYWALL.ASK_ADMIN: Please reach out to your administrator for the upgrade.

LIST.404: There are no SLAs available in this account.

EMPTY.DESC_1: Issues raised by enterprise customers, that require immediate attention.
EMPTY.DESC_2: Issues raised by enterprise customers, that needs to be acknowledged quickly.

RESPONSE_TYPES.FRT: Limite do primeiro tempo de resposta
RESPONSE_TYPES.NRT: Próximo limite de tempo de resposta

NAME.LABEL: Nome do SLA
NAME.REQUIRED_ERROR: O nome do SLA é obrigatório
NAME.VALID_ERROR: Somente alfabetos, números, hífen e sublinhado são permitidos

THRESHOLD_TIME.INVALID_FORMAT_ERROR: O limite deve ser um número e maior que zero
